addr: 27 Curtain Road. Hackney. London EC2A 3LT GB
title: Getting Your Business to the NEXT Level
desc: When a person is building a business, it is their knowledge and passion for their chosen field that helps them achieve initial success. However that knowledge and passion will not, on its own, be enough to help the business get to the NEXT level. And isn?t that where you?d like to be? At the next level? You see, in addition to needing the owner?s knowledge and passion, a business can only reach the NEXT level by focussing on these two things: Both are an ongoing process. Get them right, and you?ll consistently take your business to the next level. ? If you would like to take YOUR business to the next level, book now on this very special event. Hosted by NatWest, you will hear from two of the UK?s leading authorities in the ?Small Business? sector with their insights into what YOU and YOUR business need to do to get to the next level. ?By attending this event you will learn: Presented by KPMG and Holdsworth Advantage the content will cover practical steps, techniques and ideas that you can use straight away and get immediate results. ? ? 2.00pm: Refreshments and registration 2.30pm: Introduction from NatWest ? 2.40pm: Holdsworth Advantage, Rob Boll & Robin Tidd ? 3.20pm KPMG,?Laura Camerer Cuss 3.50pm Holdsworth Advantage, Antony Holdsworth 4.50pm Thank you and summary, NatWest 5.00pm Drinks and Networking
